section.title: mda JX10
section.para:
The plug-in is designed for high quality (lower aliasing than most soft synths) and low processor usage - this means that some features that would increase CPU load have been left out!
When Vibrato is set to PWM, the two oscillators are phase-locked and will produce a square wave if set to the same pitch. Pitch modulation of one oscillator then causes Pulse Width Modulation. (pitch modulation of both oscillators for vibrato is still available from the modulation wheel). Unlike other synths, in PWM mode the oscillators can still be detuned to give a wider range of PWM effects.

entry.para: Level of second oscillator (both oscillators are sawtooth wave only - but see Vibrato below).
Tuning of second oscillator in semitones.
Tuning of second oscillator in cents.

listitem.para: P-LEGATO - 8-voice polyphonic with pitch glide if a key is held.
M-LEGATO - monophonic with pitch glide if key is held.

entry.para: Initial pitch-glide offset, for pitch-envelope effects.
Cutoff modulation by velocity (turn fully left to disable velocity control of cutoff and amplitude).
Attack, Decay, Sustain, Release envelope for filter cutoff.
Attack, Decay, Sustain, Release envelope for amplitude.
LFO modulation of pitch - turn to left for PWM effects.
